about_the_game:
A game where you take part in an immersive chemical laboratory simulation. Produce various mixtures using equipment and substances. Use mostly mouse controls to pour chemicals from vessel to vessel.

Use processes modeled after real chemistry:
  • React
  • Dissolve
  • Precipitate
  • Filter
  • Heat
  • Boil
  • Distill
Follow recipes to produce desired outputs (e.g. Soap, Aspirin, Ethanol) and then sell them or test given chemicals for it’s content.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or later
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or later
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
